Hello, oily urine is sometimes do to diabetes, does your boyfriend have diabetes? He could be loosing ketones through his urine causing this problem. Some people also have oily urine when they began a low carb diet, I would make sure he's eating good still.Your breaking out could be as simple as if you are dieting or changing your normal. I would change my sheets daily and wash with a body scrub to see if its because of my diet or have you changed your laundry detergent if its to harsh for your skin it could break you out in general.
